title: Stack Overflow's Plan to Survive the Age of AI
author: David Cassel
description: Stack Overflow is exploring ways to bring users back to the site by compensating experts and creating personalized home pages.
cntitle: Stack Overflow 在人工智能时代下的生存计划
cndescription: Stack Overflow 正在探索通过补偿专家和创建个性化主页来吸引用户重返网站的方法。
